body.p: Which of the following is a correct representation of the given information in a two-way probability table?

response.feedback: Incorrect. 0.10 is not the probability of a suicide committed by a man using a gun, but the probability of a suicide committed by a woman not using a gun. Please try again.
Correct. The given information was P(M) = .87, P(G) = .56, and P(F and not G) = .10.
Incorrect. 0.10 is not the probability of a suicide committed by a woman, but the probability of a suicide committed by a woman not using a gun. Please try again.
Incorrect. 0.56 is not the probability of a suicide committed by a man using a gun, but the probability of a suicide committed using a gun. Please try again.
